Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to send this card from the field to the GY can be activated during your Main Phase only. Sending it to the GY is a cost.\n2. You cannot activate "Wattcube" and activate its effect to send this card to increase 1000 ATK in the same Chain. This is a Spell Speed 1 effect, you cannot Chain the effect of 2 copies of "Wattcube" to each other.\n3. The 1000 ATK increase lasts for as long as the target monster remains face-up on the field.
